nodes.text: Contispex II was the second Supreme Chancellor of the Galactic Republic who served the Pius Dea faith. A Human male, he was the son of Contispex I, and he assumed the post of Supreme Chancellor in 11,947 BBY when his father stepped down after a forty-year reign. He continued the Pius Dea Crusades, instigating the Second and Third Pius Dea Crusades against the Hutts.

Despite the Jedi Order's early support of his father, the Jedi High Council hoped that Contispex II would take a more reasoned approach to governance then his predecessor. The High Council was disappointed by the reigning Supreme Chancellor's rigidity and and religious obsession, and after thirteen years of debate, the Order decided to retreat to Ossus and sever ties with the Republic.
